#summary The navigator.onLine property specifies whether the browser is working in online or offline mode.
#labels about-dom,is-dom-property

== Values ==

The `navigator.onLine` property returns a boolean.

  * `true` means the browser is working in online mode and will try to retrieve remote resources.
  * `false` means the browser is working in offline mode and will not try to retrieve remote resources.

This property is read-only.
